name: Raul's mision
description:
Just kill monsters and have fun.

Game is not that easy, but not impossible.

Try to kill the necromancer monster who revives enemies first, he's the brown one, then simply take down the healer and later kill the others.

It's not that hard once you get a strategy to kill first the necromancer.

Use a gamepad for better feels.

Press Enter to Start the game, Press ESC to access options  and change the keys.
